action.description: The committee on TRN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Kila, Grandinetti, Kitagawa, Miyake, Muraoka, Pierick; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) La Chica; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Evslin; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran.
